page.title: 05HOUSING IN ACCRINGTON
page.content: Most of Accrington's houses are terrace(terrace means houses in a row) Some houses are on their own,they are called detached.Most houses have seven rooms,a living room,a dining room,a kitchen,a bathroom and 3 bedrooms. Around the Peel Park area most gardens are quite small if you live in a terrace,but if you live in a semi-detached or a quasi-detached they are fairly big.If you were to look around the Peel Park area you would find that most houses were made out of stone.This means that they are quite old,most ofthe terraced houses were built very early this century.Accrington is famous for{NORI bricks which are very hard and a deep red colour.{NORI}is{IRON}spelt backwards. By Sarah Greenwood and Tamsyn Feltell.
